mean_cn: adj. 华丽的，艳丽的；火焰似的
mean_en: brightly coloured and noticeable; (of people or their behaviour) different, confident and exciting in a way that attracts attention
sentence: The orange flowers on this tree are flamboyant!
sentence_trans: 这树上的橘色花朵真艳丽！
word_etyma: flam火焰 + boy少年 + ant属于...的，具有...的 → 如少年的 → flamboyant辉耀的；华丽的
